Interface IWithNative2DMode

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports Native 2D Mode, which makes it so that 3D WebView positions a native 2D webview in front of the Unity game view instead of displaying web content as a texture in the Unity scene. For more info, please see this article.

Namespace: Vuplex.WebView
Assembly: Assembly-CSharp.dll
Syntax
public interface IWithNative2DMode

Properties

Gets a value indicating whether the webview is running in Native 2D Mode.

Methods

InitInNative2DMode(Rect)

Initializes the webview in Native 2D Mode. This method is to be used instead of Init(Texture2D, Single, Single, Texture2D) for initialization.

Declaration
void InitInNative2DMode(Rect rect)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Rect rect

SetNativeZoomEnabled(Boolean)

Sets whether the native 2D webview's pinch-to-zoom behavior is enabled. The default is true.
